name: RAGHub (Andrew-Jang)
description: [项目级] A community-driven collection of RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) frameworks, projects, and resources. Contribute and explore the evolving RAG ecosystem.。来源: https://github.com/Andrew-Jang/RAGHub

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A community-driven collection of RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) frameworks, projects, and resources. Contribute and explore the evolving RAG ecosystem.

来源: https://github.com/Andrew-Jang/RAGHub
语言: unknown
Stars: 1571

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: This is a community project, and **we welcome contributions from everyone**! If you’d like to add a new framework, project, or resource, please check out our [Contribution Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) for details on how to get started.
